testcase.name: Verify cart updates after adding items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after adding items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.587s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.070s When User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.221s Then Verify cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify cart updates after removing items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after removing items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.239s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.064s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.188s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.198s And User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.201s Then Verify cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.225s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.068s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.218s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.217s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.256s Then Verify the items in cart ... passed in 0.007s When User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.237s Then Verify user should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
